FilePublisherRule.Name: windows.immersivecontrolpanel, versie 6.2.0.0 en hoger van Microsoft Corporation

FilePublisherCondition.PublisherName: CN=Microsoft Windows, O=Microsoft Corporation, L=Redmond, S=Washington, C=US

FilePublisherRule.Name: (Default) All signed packaged apps
FilePublisherRule.Description: Allows members of the Everyone group to run packaged apps that are signed.
